column6: In need of some downtime after the harrowing events of Second Coming, Cyclops heads to the Savage Land to decompress. A run-in with a personal hero will have Cyke looking at the world through new eyes! Plus, Hank McCoy and Molly Hayes talk science!
column8: | penciller:Mark Brooks | penciller:Jamie McKelvie | penciller:WHILCE PORTACIO | penciller:STEVEN MARK SANDERS | writer:Matt Fraction
